title: Katie Price's mucky mansion vs Peter Andre's spotless house: The huge differences between their homes
text:

The lives of Katie Price and Peter Andre have gone very differently since they split up in 2009.

And one of the most notable differences is between their two homes, with Katie living in her mucky mansion in Horsham and Pete living in a spotless adobe in Surrey.

The former glamour model, 41, shocked fans when she gave them a tour of her house in her latest YouTube video.

Endless bin bags full of clothes she's getting rid of, clutter she's picked up throughout her travels and suitcases full of skimpy underwear litter the house.

The rooms were empty of furniture as she currently has a team of builders in renovating the property.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Instagram)

Her nine stables have no horses, with Katie admitting they're all "full of c**p".

One even had a pile of bird poo on the floor as a nest had been made in the ceiling beams.

There is graffiti on the walls, cobwebs and cardboard boxes full of junk.

"It's exhausting to know where to start, which room which pile," Katie said in the video.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Instagram)

"I don't need these clothes and I'm always saying what can I wear? Where do I start?

"It just gives me a headache to be honest."

Katie, her toyboy Kris Boyson and her five children aren't living in the house while it gets done up.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Instagram)

Her messy house is worlds away from the homely habitat owned by Pete.

The five bedroom home has plenty of space for Pete, his wife Emily MacDonagh and their two children, five-year-old Amelia and Theodore, 2.

They need the extra space of course with Pete sharing sharing custody of Junior, 13, and Princess, 11, with Katie.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Instagram)

The house is set on a long drive behind huge iron gates and high fences, with beautifully manicured gowns.

The kids have got every luxury available to them at their dad's place, with a swimming pool, tennis court and football pitch outside.

Their dining room has a table with enough room for the whole family to eat together.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Instagram)

Around the sparkling table are plush velvet seats, with glistening patio doors to the garden in the background

The Andres' giant kitchen is also decorated with a farmhouse-style sink and granite worktops.

Sitting in the garage is a black Bentley with personalised plates and a white BMW parked outside.
description: Katie, 41, recently gave a tour of her house, showing off stacks of rubbish, graffitied walls and bird poo on the floor
